container.title: Dawn-Intro
commands: AddSprite; MainTextBoxSprite; testsprite; Oyster/Sprites/; (300,300); spriteIsCool = true
AddSprite; sugma; testsprite; Oyster/Sprites/; (700,300); spriteIsCool = true
AddTextBox; MainTextBox; (300,300); (500,500); font = Oyster/Fonts/Drawn-DefaultSDF.asset; colour = #000000; fontSize = 100; text = 'sugma moment'
AddSmoothText; 'hello peter griffin, welcome to fortnite'; MainTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; '1m Reference Cube'; moveTo = (-0.94, 0.5, -4.05); rotateTo = (-16.05, -10.13, 17.3); scaleTo = (1.5, 2, 0.5); interpolation = linear; time = 5; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (-1.92, 0.8, -2.34); rotateTo = (-25.23, -126.68, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 10; clickToSkip = true
